content: अखंडित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. त.] {@--1@} Unbroken, undivided. {@--2@} Uninterrupted, perpetual, undisturbed, continuous; °ता मे वाणिज्या <ls>Mu. 1</ls>; अखंडितं प्रेम लभस्व पत्युः <ls>Ku. 7. 28</ls> everlasting, unbroken. {@--3@} Unimpaired; unrefuted &c; भट्टिन्या अखंडितात् प्रणयात् <ls>M. 3</ls> never disappointed; शतमखं तमखंडितपौरुषं <ls>R. 9. 13</ls> whose prowess knows no repulse or defeat.
